name: Code Name Generator
description: Need a slick code name that screams 'secret agent' or 'tech wizard'? Look no further! Our Code Name Generator is here to arm you with aliases so cool, they're practically classified.
introduction: Whether you're diving into a new project, creating a character for your next game, or just want to feel a bit more mysterious, a great code name is essential. This generator combines cool prefixes and suffixes to conjure up names that are both memorable and, dare we say, a little bit dangerous.
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. (It's the one that looks like it holds all the secrets.)
Behold your new, ultra-cool code name! (Prepare to be amazed.)
Not feeling it? Hit 'Generate' again! We've got code names for days. (Seriously, days.)
Copy your favorite and share it (or keep it top secret, your call!).
Use your code name wisely... the world is watching. (Or at least, we are.)

faqs.question: What exactly *is* a code name?
faqs.answer: A code name is a secret or unofficial name used to refer to something or someone, usually to protect its identity or keep it hidden from unauthorized individuals. Think James Bond, but for your everyday projects!

faqs.question: Can I use these code names for real-world secret missions?
faqs.answer: While we encourage a healthy dose of imagination, we're not responsible for any international espionage activities you might undertake. Use these names for fun, creative projects, or just to spice up your online persona.

faqs.question: Are the generated code names truly random?
faqs.answer: As random as we can make them! Our algorithm combines prefixes and suffixes in a way that ensures a wide variety of unique and intriguing code names. There might be some overlap eventually, but the possibilities are vast.

faqs.question: Can I suggest prefixes or suffixes to add to the generator?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! We're always looking for ways to improve. Send your suggestions our way, and we'll see if we can incorporate them into the mix. The cooler, the better!

faqs.question: Is this generator free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, indeed! Our Code Name Generator is completely free. Use it as much as you like, and share the code name love with your friends.

faqs.question: Will my generated code names be saved or tracked?
faqs.answer: Nope! We respect your privacy. Generated code names are not saved or tracked in any way. What happens with your code name is entirely up to you.
